rit.eyeTrackingAPI.EyeTrackerUtilities.udpClients
Class IViewXComm

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      rit.eyeTrackingAPI.EyeTrackerUtilities.udpClients.EyeTrackerClient
          rit.eyeTrackingAPI.EyeTrackerUtilities.udpClients.IViewXComm
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class IViewXComm
extends EyeTrackerClient

A class used to set up communication with the iViewX eye tracking device. This class runs on a seperate thread. Necessary, because otherwise issues occur when communicating with the iViewX and trying to draw to the GLCanvas at the same time.

Author:
Corey Engelman

Method Detail

run

public void run()
Overrides the run method. First sets up UDP connection with the iViewX, then enters a loop and continuously tries to receive data from the iViewX eye tracking device until the requestStop() method is called.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class EyeTrackerClient
